channel.title: Converting models into playermodels
channel.description:
I have recently found a packet of cod4 soldiers on gmod.org,
I want to convert them into playermodels. But they are packaged strangely like this:
First folder-Second folder- A lot of mdls, vtx, vmt (for materials), phys, etc.
some vmts are for more than one skin.
PLEASE HELP!!

item.title: Converting models into playermodels
item.dc:creator: Cobra
item.description:
Thanks, It might take a while tho , my Source SDK doesn’t work, My Total commander just broke so I’m pretty screwed and WinRAR is very confusing to me so I can’t make a lot of trips between the Playermodels and models folder because the stress caused by it is killing me.

If anyone would be so kind as to upload the playermodels to Filefront,
These are the skins: https://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=57280

I only need Navy NWU and Marine MARPAT

Do this if you can after the Update

Read full topic

item.title: Converting models into playermodels
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
They are packaged like that because there is one base model that uses different bodygroups.

You should check the Models/Skins section on Facepunch for assistance.

Garry is supposed to add new playermodel animations this week, so I’d wait for that to happen before trying anything.

Read full topic
